movie.title: On My Skin: The Last Seven Days of Stefano Cucchi
movie.title_english: On My Skin: The Last Seven Days of Stefano Cucchi
movie.title_long: On My Skin: The Last Seven Days of Stefano Cucchi (2018)
movie.description_intro: The incredible true story behind the most controversial Italian court cases in recent years. Stefano Cucchi was arrested for a minor crime but in just one week's time, a family is changed forever.
movie.description_full: The incredible true story behind the most controversial Italian court cases in recent years. Stefano Cucchi was arrested for a minor crime but in just one week's time, a family is changed forever.

movies.title: One Million Years B.C.
movies.summary: Caveman Tumak (John Richardson) is banished from his savage tribe. He finds a brief home amongst a group of gentle seacoast dwelling cave people until he is banished from them as well. Missing him, one of their women, Loana (Raquel Welch), leaves with him, deciding to face the harsh prehistoric world with its monsters and volcanoes as a couple.
movies.description_full: Caveman Tumak (John Richardson) is banished from his savage tribe. movies.title: Within These Walls
movies.summary: A prisoner in her own home, a captive in her own body. Assaulted and trapped with no one to hear her cries for help...and knowing no one will believe her if they do. This is the terrifying reality Alaina finds herself in when she moves in to the house her mother died in. At first she thinks it's the loss of her mother that is haunting her, but she is soon shown it is something far more malicious and unrelenting. The spirit taunts her as it invades her body, mind, and soul, completely trapping her. Alaina has to fight for answers on what really happened to her mother if she has any hopes of survival. She must find a way to endure this monster who lives and breathes to rob her of her sanity as it demands a savage hold on her.

movies.title: Let the Lion Roar
movies.summary: Uncover one of the greatest and darkest deceptions of our time - the conspiracy to cover up the Church's true identity.
movies.description_full: Uncover one of the greatest and darkest deceptions of our time - the conspiracy to cover up the Church's true identity.
